entries.original: **Autopilot Command** (`/oh-my-claudecode:autopilot`): Full autonomous execution from idea to working code - 5-phase workflow: Expansion → Planning → Execution → QA → Validation - Magic keywords: "autopilot", "build me", "create me", "I want a/an" - Parallel validation with 3 architects (functional, security, quality) - Resume support with progress preservation
entries.translation: **Autopilot 명령어** (`/oh-my-claudecode:autopilot`): 아이디어에서 작동하는 코드까지의 완전한 자율 실행 - 5단계 워크플로우: 확장 → 계획 → 실행 → QA → 검증 - 매직 키워드: "autopilot", "build me", "create me", "I want a/an" - 3명의 아키텍트(기능, 보안, 품질)와 병렬 검증 - 진행 상태 보존과 함께 재개 지원

entries.original: **Cancel-autopilot Skill** (`/oh-my-claudecode:cancel-autopilot`): Graceful cancellation with state preservation
entries.translation: **Cancel-autopilot 스킬** (`/oh-my-claudecode:cancel-autopilot`): 상태 보존과 함께 우아한 취소

entries.original: **8 new specialized agents registered**: security-reviewer, security-reviewer-low, build-fixer, build-fixer-low, tdd-guide, tdd-guide-low, code-reviewer, code-reviewer-low
entries.translation: **8개의 새로운 전문 에이전트 등록**: security-reviewer, security-reviewer-low, build-fixer, build-fixer-low, tdd-guide, tdd-guide-low, code-reviewer, code-reviewer-low

entries.original: **Autopilot HUD element**: Real-time phase progress display
entries.translation: **Autopilot HUD 요소**: 실시간 단계 진행 상황 표시

entries.original: Agent count: 20 → 28 (8 previously documented agents now registered)
